repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:latest
MAINTAINER imlonghao <imlonghao@gmail.com>

RUN echo "deb http://shadowsocks.org/debian wheezy main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y --force-yes shadowsocks-libev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ENTRYPOINT ["/usr/bin/ss-server"]
